nodes.text: The Royal Slave Auction was held on Zygerria, the homeworld and headquarters of the Zygerrian Slave Empire.

Although the Zygerrians were forced to disband the slave auction years prior to the Clone Wars due to Jedi intervention, Queen Miraj Scintel brought it back during the Clone Wars, in which she attempted to auction off the captured Togruta population of Kiros.
